data.title: Automotive Cleaner Salary in Summitville,New York (July 29, 2024)
data.meta_description: How much does an Automotive Cleaner make? The average annual salary of Automotive Cleaner in Summitville,New York is $28,503 or $14 per hour, ranging from $18,760 to $39,966 and $9 to $19.

View Automotive Cleaner Salary by Experience Levels

An entry-level Automotive Cleaner with under 1 year experience makes about $27,568. With less than 2 years of experience, a mid-level Automotive Cleaner makes around $28,465. After 2-4 years, the Automotive Cleaner pay rises to about $30,426. Those senior Automotive Cleaner with 5-8 years of experience earn roughly $30,693, and those Automotive Cleaner having 8 years or more experience are expected to earn about $31,138 on average.
